ItemTooltips.boots: Everybody need boots. Bulid them into Phase Boots for escape or to get inn the middle of a team fight to spam Death Pulse.
ItemTooltips.flask: Take it for you in a calm situation, or better give it to your carry.
ItemTooltips.ward_observer: Always have at least 2 wards on the map! Always.
ItemTooltips.tango: The resouce of hp in the first minutes. Later on you will not need any health regenerating items because of your Death Pulse, Sadist and Mekansm.
ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Escape or get into the middle of the fight. Or just follow your team mates, because necro is really slow.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: This item can change a team fight to your benefit. There should always be one supporter in your team with mek!
ItemTooltips.pipe: If you are against heavy casting heroes, this will shield you and your team. If someone else already bought, forget it.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: If you are against tanky enemies, buy it. Or if you like to ult more. It also gives you some nice general stats.
ItemTooltips.bloodstone: If not too late in game, its perfekt for a better surving.
ItemTooltips.veil_of_discord: GIves some survailability, extra damage and enhances your DEATH PULSE and REAPER'S SCYTHE wonderful. If you buy it, maybe forget about Aghanim's. Fits perfekt to a supporting Necro. (thx to Spacebear)
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: i havent tried it yet, but it seem to be good in mid game for ganking. Try it out.
